This is a nunjucks template file (see https://mozilla.github.io/nunjucks/). This template is executed for each table. This one is for {{ table.name }} table. It is passed a table variable. table variable is a pg-structure object. Documentation for pg-structure can be found on http://www.pg-structure.com Below is messages from template's index.js. {{ messageAll }} {{ message }} Below is an example of a loop for listing all columns of the table separated by comma. See if condition which checks loop to prevent printing an extra comma for last column. {% for column in table.columns.array %} {{ column.name }} is type of {{ column.type }}{% if not loop.last -%},{% endif -%} {% endfor %}
